headline: DraftKings' competition in prediction markets, AI stock rally
summary: Market Domination host Myles Udland and Bullseye American Ingenuity Fund's Adam Johnson track several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including DraftKings' (DKNG) increased competition with other prediction markets like Robinhood Markets (HOOD) and the AI catalysts driving stock moves in companies like CoreWeave (CRWV), Nvidia (NVDA), Applied Digital (APLD), and Celestica (CLS). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Why Robinhood (HOOD) Stock Is Trading Up Today
summary: Shares of financial services company Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) jumped 2.8% in the afternoon session after Bank of America raised its price target on the stock and the company's CEO made bullish comments on the future of finance.

headline: Why Robinhood (HOOD) Is Up 9.7% After S&P 500 Inclusion and Expansion Milestones
summary: In September 2025, Robinhood Markets reached a series of milestones, including surpassing 4 billion event contracts traded in its prediction markets, launching banking services, and being added to major indices such as the S&P 500. Robinhood's ongoing discussions with regulators for international expansion, coupled with its move toward tokenized assets, signal a significant shift toward becoming a global, full-service financial hub. We'll explore how Robinhood's rapid growth in prediction...

headline: Trending Stocks: Samsung, SK Hynix, Alibaba, and crypto
summary: SK Hynix (000660.KS) and Samsung (005930.KS) shares rose after announcing partnerships with OpenAI (OPAI.PVT) to build data centers in South Korea. Analysts at JPMorgan increased their price target on Alibaba (9988.HK) citing an improved cloud-revenue outlook and growing synergy between its AI and e-commerce operations. Meanwhile, crypto stocks, like Coinbase (COIN), Robinhood (HOOD) and Strategy (MSTR), rose as bitcoin (BTC-USD) continued to climb as the government shutdown entered its second day.

headline: Robinhood CEO: Here’s when the tokenisation ‘freight train’ will shake up the $115tn stock market
